title: Funnest champions in each role?
body:
Personally i think its:

Top: {{champion:39}}. She feels so satisfying to play as and has a fun-to-use ultimate.
Jungle: {{champion:28}}. Being invisible for long periods of time gives you that "hah! Nobody knows where i am!" feeling which i love to have.
Mid: {{champion:127}} Not a popular pick but definently my favorite, her Q gaining bonus range off minions feels very cool and her {{summoner:4}}+W is a fun combo.
ADC: {{champion:21}} Excecuting minions with her Q, then having it bounce to the enemy and take half their health is just the most "haha" feeling ever.
Support: {{champion:163}} its really hard to narrow it down since i love so many supports, but her powerspike at level 3 is simply amazing on a support and can sometimes gauruntee a kill.

What do you guys think?

replies.body:
Top: {{champion:111}} It's so fun building one armor or magic resist item for the laning phase and then stop taking any damage from them! 

Jg: {{champion:7}} I've done this a couple times with attack speed runes instead of AP ones. It's actually not as bad as you think it is.

Mid: {{champion:268}} Not biased.

ADC: {{champion:268}} Not biased.

Supp: {{champion:9}} Fun to play, but I wanna kms if I ever go against this.

Nothing is more vexing than a Fiddlesticks in ARAM. It makes your losing chances a lot higher. If you get him there, go full ap runes, the E alone can harm really badly the squishies even at level 3, you have a very high chance of winning the match.

Support for me would be {{champion:35}} , The countless amount of times that I've tricked an adc or support into my boxes is hilarious, It's extremely fun playing around the minds of your opponents and makes you look like you are a genius when you outplay them.
